options.description:
Discovery - If discovery is enabled (recommended), KS Assistant will automatically discover devices and entities which publish their configuration on the MQTT broker. If discovery is disabled, all configuration must be done manually.
Discovery prefix - The prefix a configuration topic for automatic discovery must start with.
Birth message - The birth message will be sent each time KS Assistant (re)connects to the MQTT broker.
Will message - The will message will be sent each time KS Assistant loses its connection to the broker, both in case of a clean (e.g. KS Assistant shutting down) and in case of an unclean (e.g. KS Assistant crashing or losing its network connection) disconnect.
